mapper.update:
update t_canteen
canteen_id = #{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
canteen_name = #{canteenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
leader = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
institution_id = #{institutionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
canteen_type = #{canteenType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
level = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
is_card = #{isCard,jdbcType=BIT},
is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
picking_time = #{pickingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_assess = #{isAssess,jdbcType=BIT},
is_warning = #{isWarning,jdbcType=BIT},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imageurl = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_canteen set canteen_id = #{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, canteen_name = #{canteenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leader = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, institution_id = #{institutionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, canteen_type = #{canteenType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, level = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, is_card = #{isCard,jdbcType=BIT}, is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, picking_time = #{pickingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_assess = #{isAssess,jdbcType=BIT}, is_warning = #{isWarning,jdbcType=BIT}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imageurl = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * from t_canteen where canteen_id=#{canteenId} and is_delete=0
select * from t_canteen where is_delete=0 and institution_id=#{institutionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id,canteen_id,canteen_name from t_canteen where is_delete=0 and canteen_id=#{canteenId}

SELECT id,canteen_id,tenant_id,canteen_name,description,is_assess,address,canteen_type,imageurl from t_canteen where is_delete=0
and canteen_name like concat(#{canteenName},'%')

select tc.id,tc.canteen_id,tc.tenant_id,tc.canteen_name,tc.description,tc.is_assess,tc.address,tc.canteen_type,tc.imageurl from t_canteen tc,t_associator_canteen tac where tc.is_delete=0 and tc.canteen_id=tac.canteen_id and tac.associator_id=#{associatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by tac.bind_time desc

select tc.id,tc.canteen_id,tc.tenant_id,tc.canteen_name,tc.description,tc.is_assess,tc.address,tc.canteen_type,tc.imageurl from t_canteen tc,t_tenant_associator_canteen tac where tc.is_delete=0 and tc.canteen_id=tac.canteen_id and tac.associator_id=#{associatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id from t_canteen order by id desc limit 1;
select is_card from t_canteen where canteen_id=#{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ym.canteen_id FROM y_machine ym,y_res_type yrt WHERE ym.id = yrt.machine_id AND yrt.res_type_id = #{resTypeId}
select ym.canteen_id FROM y_machine ym,y_page yp WHERE ym.id = yp.machine_id AND yp.id = #{resTypeId}
